name: The Roomba (MichaelMIKI)
description:
The game is about you throwing garbage at a Roomba Boss and when you fill the roomba with garbage you win.

The Roomba will also try to attack you with his mini roombas and other vacuum cleaners.

The game is made in 3 hours for theTrijam #208: The 3 hour game jam.

This is my first time creating a game for a game jam i hope you enjoy.
